entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
